text: Household ammonia is a marketed substance that consists of a dilute solution of ammonia in water. About 7% of the solution by weight is ammonia. It is used for cleaning. It can also be known as ammonium hydroxide, but it really exists in the form NH3 \+ H2O rather than NH4+ \+ OH-. ==Related pages== *Ammonium *Ammonia *Housecleaning Category:Cleaning tools Category:Nitrogen compounds
title: Household ammonia
